snippet: A ban on financial transactions with Iran has inadvertently affected critical supplies that are exempted from Western sanctions.
abstract: Ban on financial transactions with Iran has inadvertently affected imports of critical medical supplies that are exempted from Western sanctions.
lead_paragraph: A ban on financial transactions with Iran has inadvertently affected critical supplies that are exempted from Western sanctions.

headline.seo: Iran Sanctions Take Toll on Medical Imports
headline.main: Iran Sanctions Take Unexpected Toll on Medical Imports
headline.print_headline: Iran Sanctions Take Unexpected Toll on Medical Imports
